Pawnmorph.MorphDef.label: helixienmorph
Pawnmorph.MorphDef.description: The Helixienmorph is a hybrid Leopard Slug / humanoid. The Helixienmorph constantly secretes a foul-smelling, corrosive gas that produces an uncomfortable, itchy sensation in living beings. This gas is mostly harmless, unless it comes into contact with decaying organic matter: it greatly accelerates corpse rotting, liberating a black putrid liquid known as "purge fluid" or corpse bile. The helixienmorph feeds on this liquid sludge, although it can also feed on other organic matter if needed.\n\nThe sight of a Helixienmorph is quite revolting, and watching one wallowing in a pile of human corpses is, to say the least, a deeply traumatizing experience.
